briefTitle: A Precision and Accuracy Study of the Codman Valve Position Verification (VPV) System.
officialTitle: A Precision and Accuracy Study of the Codman Valve Position Verification (VPV) System.
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the agreement rate between the CODMAN Valve Position Verification (VPV) adjustment outcome (reprogramming) and X-ray verification in order to support an alternative to X-ray confirmation with respect to the valve adjustment process.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Achieved "Adjustment Complete" and a Consensus X-ray Reading
